QUESTION2.ques: What of the following best describes you?

RESULT1.option.1: Custom made - to the profile of you feet.
RESULT1.option.2: Durable - Strong and made to last
RESULT1.option.3: Good value - Exercise with peace of mind.

RESULT2.result: Physical activities like running can over time, place additional pressure on your feet, legs and spine which over time can lead to pain. Wearing insoles ensures you maintain correct posture even when engaging in exercise.
RESULT2.option.1: Custom made - to the profile of you feet.
RESULT2.option.2: Durable - Strong and made to last
RESULT2.option.3: Good value - Exercise with peace of mind.
